text: "Back to You" is a song by English recording artist Mollie King. The song is about King's on and off relationship with model David Gandy. The single was released as a digital download on 19 August 2016 by Island Records. ==Background and release== "Back to You" is King's debut single following the hiatus of girl group The Saturdays. "Back To You" peaked at Number 90 on the UK Singles Chart (Number 38 on the sales only version of the chart), Number 11 on the iTunes UK singles chart and has sold over 15,000 copies in the UK to date. Category:2016 songs Category:2016 singles Category:Songs written by Ryan Ogren Category:Songs written by Rob Persaud
title: Back to You (Mollie King song)
